# Plan: ChromaDB Integration Enhancement & Documentation

**Date Created:** December 2, 2025
**Status:** IN_PROGRESS
**Objective:** Extend ChromaDB capabilities with retrieval utilities, create integration guides, and establish best practices across vibe-tools ecosystem

## Phase Breakdown

### Phase 1: Enhance Retrieval Capabilities ✓ READY
- Create CodeRetriever utility with semantic search
- Implement query-by-similarity patterns
- Add metadata filtering options
- Document retrieval patterns

### Phase 2: Create Integration Examples
- Build example scripts for different use cases
- Document agent retrieval workflow
- Create copy-paste integration guides
- Show context injection patterns

### Phase 3: Establish Best Practices
- Document connection patterns (HttpClient setup)
- Create integration checklist for new tools
- Archive patterns and learnings
- Build reusable templates

### Phase 4: Testing & Validation
- Verify retrieval accuracy on all collections
- Test with actual agent definitions
- Validate memory persistence
- Performance baseline testing

## Dependencies
- Phase 1 → enables Phase 2
- Phase 2 → informs Phase 3
- Phase 3 + Phase 4 are parallel after Phase 2

## Success Criteria
✅ Retrieval utilities working with local HttpClient
✅ Integration documentation for new tools
✅ Example scripts demonstrating each pattern
✅ Best practices guide available
✅ All collections (1,900+ chunks) searchable
